content: 2009 Singaporean film ***Here*** is a [Singaporean](/wiki/Singapore) film released in 2009, written and directed by [Ho Tzu Nyen](/wiki/Ho_Tzu_Nyen). The film was selected for screening at the 41st Directors Fortnight section at the [Cannes Film Festival](/wiki/Cannes_Film_Festival) and was also nominated for [Golden Kinnaree Award](/wiki/Golden_Kinnaree_Award) in 2009. ## Synopsis *Here* follows the journey of a man who struggles to make sense of his reality. Reeling from the sudden death of his wife, he loses the will to speak and is interned at Island Hospital. There, he meets strident kleptomaniac Beatrice with whom he forms an inexplicable bond. As the man adjusts to life within, he is selected for an experimental treatment, which forces him to confront the devastating truth behind his past, present, and future. ## Cast - John Low as H - Jo Tan as B - Hemang Yadav as Freddie - George Kuruvilla as Editor - Official website - *Here* at [IMDb](/wiki/IMDb_(identifier)) This article related to a Singaporean film is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Here (2009 film)
